name: crossover
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process or result of changing from one activity or style to another: The band's crossover from country into pop lost them some fans.
US a type of vehicle that has some features of an SUV and some features of an ordinary car

Add to word list
a change from one form to another, or a mixture of different types: There’s been a lot of crossover from comic books to movies. His crossover music blends Western and ethnic styles.
